trans-unit.source: Represents the possible update modes for the content in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示可能的更新模式中的内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The UpdatePanelUpdateMode enumeration defines the possible update modes for the content of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: UpdatePanelUpdateMode 枚举定义的内容的可能的更新模式<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A> property must be set to one of the values of the UpdatePanelUpdateMode enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A>属性必须设置为 UpdatePanelUpdateMode 枚举值之一。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control requires that the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control be `true` for partial-page rendering to occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件要求<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件为`true`局部页面呈现发生。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnablePartialRendering%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A> property is Always.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is inside another <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control and the parent panel is updated, the nested panel will also be updated regardless of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件位于另一个<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>更新控件和父面板，也将更新而不考虑，嵌套的面板<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control is updated for all postbacks that originate from the page.
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控件更新为所有源于页面的回发。

trans-unit.source: The content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control is updated under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控件更新以下情况下︰

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control is called explicitly.
- If a control is defined as a trigger by using the Triggers property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control and causes a postback.
trans-unit.target: -如果控件使用触发器属性的定义为触发器<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制并导致回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the control is an explicit trigger for updating the panel content.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，控件是显式触发器为更新面板内容。

trans-unit.source: The trigger control can be either inside or outside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control that defines the trigger.
trans-unit.target: 触发器控件均可以是内部或外部<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>定义该触发器的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is set to `true` and a child control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control causes a postback.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>属性设置为`true`和子控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制会导致回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control are implicit triggers for updating the panel.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，子控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件是用于更新面板的隐式触发器。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: Child controls of nested <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls do not cause the outer <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control to be updated unless they are explicitly defined as triggers.
trans-unit.target: 子控件的嵌套<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件不会导致外部<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，除非它们显式定义为触发器会更新。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>
